PlanetaryDiplomat42.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion and profession was interplanetary politics. [PAWN_pronoun] was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted [PAWN_objective]self to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

ChildProdigy22.title: Child prodigy
ChildProdigy22.desc: After graduating college at age twelve, Jered devoted his life to becoming immortal. However his research crossed the line when he tried to modify his body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. He was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

RenegadeEngineer33.title: Renegade engineer
RenegadeEngineer33.desc:
After a daring escape from the prison planet with a small crew of fellow inmates, Jered set his gaze on his homeworld.
He travelled there, recruited more followers, hijacked a space cruiser, and launched into the void.

BoneCollector51.title: Bone collector
BoneCollector51.desc:
Born to a family of fortune hunters, [PAWN_nameDef] always had a passion for ancient history.
Though never a tough or social boy, [PAWN_pronoun] loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Osteologist68.title: Osteologist
Osteologist68.desc:
After graduating university at the top of his class, [PAWN_nameDef] quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor.
With his new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

GNomeSculptor81.title: G-nome sculptor
GNomeSculptor81.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. He was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology.
The G-nome scientists nicknamed him Gizmo and occupied him with sculpting. He developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

Gnomebiologist56.title: Gnomebiologist
Gnomebiologist56.desc:
Gizmo was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. He went to conferences and managed an art gallery.
However, he never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be his true profession.

CircusPerformer69.title: Circus performer
CircusPerformer69.desc:
Growing up in the circus, [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls he juggled were the pockets he picked between shows.
A mistake with some firesticks made him develop a deathly fear of fire.

CriminalKingpin63.title: Criminal kingpin
CriminalKingpin63.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] discovered his gift - people did what he said, when he said it. Taking advantage of this, he set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for himself in the criminal underworld.
Having people do things for him taught him to avoid manual labor at all costs.

VatgrownSlavegirl4.title: Vatgrown slavegirl
VatgrownSlavegirl4.desc: Emmie was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbvilág laboratory. As a young child, she was taught only to cook, clean and serve her masters. For most of her childhood, she knew nothing else.

UrbworldSexSlave3.title: Urbworld sex slave
UrbworldSexSlave3.desc: Emmie was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against her masters, she was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

GunKid57.title: Gun kid
GunKid57.desc:
Growing up in a urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef] never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.
In the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

UrbworldSergeant87.title: Urbworld sergeant
UrbworldSergeant87.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for all things militaristic kept with him all the way to adulthood.
After enrolling as a local policeman, he was soon promoted to sergeant.

FeudalLordling43.title: Feudal lordling
FeudalLordling43.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed many privileges.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

SystemLord49.title: System lord
SystemLord49.desc: For [PAWN_nameDef], ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. [PAWN_pronoun] sought to expand his influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

FeudalFarmBoy31.title: Feudal farm boy
FeudalFarmBoy31.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.
He lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

HunterOfTheKing3.title: Hunter of the king
HunterOfTheKing3.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.
Despite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. [PAWN_nameDef] developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. [PAWN_pronoun] was named for the place they found him.

SpaceFanboy24.title: Space fanboy
SpaceFanboy24.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] dreamed of space travel. He built his own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

Castaway19.title: Castaway
Castaway19.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When his ship was destroyed, he lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

GlitterworldNerd52.title: Glitterworld nerd
GlitterworldNerd52.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] loved technology from the day [PAWN_pronoun] was born. [PAWN_pronoun] had a mechanoid companion which [PAWN_pronoun] tried to modify when [PAWN_pronoun] was 10.
[PAWN_possessive] obsession with technology meant that [PAWN_pronoun] never appreciated arts or culture.

EnergyResearcher46.title: Energy researcher
EnergyResearcher46.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. [PAWN_pronoun] made an error which destroyed [PAWN_possessive] lab and most of the city. [PAWN_pronoun] fled the planet to escape the authorities.

WarChild73.title: War child
WarChild73.desc: Mushinto's parents were drafted into a civil war in his home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, he became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. His expressive side, however, never developed.

BountyHunter22.title: Bounty hunter
BountyHunter22.desc: When the civil war ended, Mushinto had to find a new way to use his fighting skills. He decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that he enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

UpperUrbworlder20.title: Upper urbworlder
UpperUrbworlder20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a privileged childhood on a major urbvilág. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time reading or drawing the cityscape he saw through [PAWN_possessive] window.

Missionary23.title: Missionary
Missionary23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to devote [PAWN_possessive] life to religious service. [PAWN_pronoun] made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

IdealisticCadet35.title: Idealistic cadet
IdealisticCadet35.desc:
Raised in the military traditions of his forefathers, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught from a young age that he would be a great leader and the hero of the Dichter family.
He excelled at his studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

MercenaryPilot69.title: Mercenary pilot
MercenaryPilot69.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] convinced his squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in.
His men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

ChildOfGlass96.title: Child of glass
ChildOfGlass96.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.
To survive on a planet devoid of life, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

LoneTraveler73.title: Lone traveler
LoneTraveler73.desc:
After escaping [PAWN_possessive] homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.
[PAWN_pronoun] joined resistance groups and applied the skills [PAWN_pronoun] cultivated on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] often warned of the nuclear horror [PAWN_pronoun] saw as a child.

AmateurBotanist14.title: Amateur botanist
AmateurBotanist14.desc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

Undertaker50.title: Undertaker
Undertaker50.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While he never shied away from physical confrontation, he prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

ChildSlave6.title: Child slave
ChildSlave6.desc: Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

Mercenary75.title: Mercenary
Mercenary75.desc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, Graham developed a lack of respect for life. He proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where he developed skills using guns and survival techniques. Graham did dirty work where he found it, and traveled to many worlds.

AdventuringChild56.title: Adventuring child
AdventuringChild56.desc:
Axle was raised to become an engineer. For years, he planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life.
One night, after his parents fell asleep, he managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

HiredAssassin2.title: Hired assassin
HiredAssassin2.desc: Axle was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, he made a name for himself and shifted his business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

VideoGamer91.title: Video gamer
VideoGamer91.desc: Ryan was raised in a glitterworld. Everything he wanted came to him. In school he was a social butterfly. At home, he spent his time looking up the newest gadgets and playing his favourite video games.

SpaceshipChef34.title: Spaceship chef
SpaceshipChef34.desc: Ryan got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. He enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but he never got used to cleaning the dishes.

DreadedBaby55.title: Dreaded baby
DreadedBaby55.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, [PAWN_pronoun] invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude3.title: Dreaded dude
DreadedDude3.desc:
Some followers say that [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.
There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

TechHead78.title: Tech-head
TechHead78.desc:
Standing on the ship hull with his father in an child-size EVA suit, [PAWN_nameDef] loved space from a young age.
[PAWN_pronoun] was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like [PAWN_possessive] father, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time taking care of plants in [PAWN_possessive] messy room. [PAWN_possessive] nickname was given for [PAWN_possessive] love of circles.

SystemsEngineer27.title: Systems engineer
SystemsEngineer27.desc:
Like [PAWN_possessive] father, [PAWN_nameDef] was a systems engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] was qualified in both colony and ship systems.
When not working, [PAWN_pronoun] would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, [PAWN_pronoun] did these things mostly alone.

Tinkerer87.title: Tinkerer
Tinkerer87.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. He learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, he eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

Engineer9.title: Engineer
Engineer9.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

DisplacedNoble82.title: Displaced noble
DisplacedNoble82.desc: Born on an urbvilág to the ruler of three megacities, [PAWN_nameDef]’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew [PAWN_possessive] family. Exile introduced [PAWN_nameDef] to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

Minister38.title: Minister
Minister38.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep [PAWN_possessive] citizens content. [PAWN_pronoun] had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though [PAWN_pronoun] never forgot how to do hard work.

ChessMaster23.title: Chess master
ChessMaster23.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] loved to play chess. [PAWN_pronoun] even earned the nickname Bishop for some of [PAWN_possessive] craftier moves.
[PAWN_pronoun] never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

Pirate65.title: Pirate
Pirate65.desc:
As a pirate leader, Bishop was well-known for his cunning plans and chess-like traps. [PAWN_pronoun] was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target.
[PAWN_possessive] name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

Orphan62.title: Orphan
Orphan62.desc: Born on a deep space station, [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, he stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

BountyHunter14.title: Bounty hunter
BountyHunter14.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a self-employed bounty hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

Straggler99.title: Straggler
Straggler99.desc:
Despite being blessed with parental love, [PAWN_nameDef] hardly knew his parents.
[PAWN_pronoun] was frequently left to his own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring his interests…and getting into trouble.

Spiceminer98.title: Spiceminer
Spiceminer98.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] made his mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen’The.
Little did he know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change his life.

BrutalThief33.title: Brutal thief
BrutalThief33.desc:
Growing up in a gang, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the brutality of the streets.
Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

CrimeLord40.title: Crime lord
CrimeLord40.desc:
Through brutality and cruelty, [PAWN_nameDef] rose to the rank of crime lord.
He relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

BoySoldier18.title: Boy soldier
BoySoldier18.desc:
War may never change - but the cast of characters does.
Born on a violent urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

MarbleDoctor3.title: Marble doctor
MarbleDoctor3.desc:
On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid.
[PAWN_nameDef] used his medical skills to help the injured and the sick. [PAWN_pronoun] believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

ApocalypseChild97.title: Apocalypse child
ApocalypseChild97.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.
He told everyone that he had no luck.

MobHenchman44.title: Mob henchman
MobHenchman44.desc: After being "saved" from his home world by a slaver ship, [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to an urbvilág crime lord, where he was used as a henchman. He specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

OrphanOfWar96.title: Orphan of war
OrphanOfWar96.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] lost his family and home early in life. His life became emotionally hollow, but his painful memories drove him to survive.
[PAWN_pronoun] took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

MechWarVeteran90.title: Mech war veteran
MechWarVeteran90.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since he was old enough to enlist. [PAWN_pronoun] has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than he cares to recall. These experiences left him hardened, both mentally and physically.

ImperialStudent92.title: Imperial student
ImperialStudent92.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed [PAWN_objective] to focus on [PAWN_possessive] botanical research.

PoisonGardener85.title: Poison gardener
PoisonGardener85.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent almost all [PAWN_possessive] time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society.
In that time [PAWN_pronoun] learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

PowerMadScholar58.title: Power-mad scholar
PowerMadScholar58.desc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within [PAWN_nameDef], and came to form his core drive. When not entombed within libraries, [PAWN_pronoun] would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

ArtificerRampant50.title: Artificer rampant
ArtificerRampant50.desc:
Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.
[PAWN_pronoun] formed a crew to gather materials for [PAWN_possessive] work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

Orphan91.title: Orphan
Orphan91.desc:
Left alone in the world without parents, Kevin did the best he could to adapt.
Having to take care both of himself and younger kids at the orphanage, he learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

NeuroScientist84.title: Neuro scientist
NeuroScientist84.desc:
Kevin worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain.
After succeeding in mapping the whole brain, Kevin joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

Abductee39.title: Abductee
Abductee39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

PirateCaptain0.title: Pirate captain
PirateCaptain0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked his way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. He leads his crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

BlackjackPlayer50.title: Blackjack player
BlackjackPlayer50.desc:
The only useful skill [PAWN_nameDef] learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.
When he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

HedgeFundManager27.title: Hedge fund manager
HedgeFundManager27.desc:
A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef]'s portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.
As he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

AcademyStudent52.title: Academy student
AcademyStudent52.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] went to school like a good space cadet would. He was very tall and was known for his good looks.
Though he worried more about his hairstyle than his grades, he still somehow passed the final exams.

ComputerEngineer28.title: Computer engineer
ComputerEngineer28.desc:
Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, [PAWN_nameDef] saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".
With his wife Morgan, [PAWN_nameDef] undertook a journey into the unknown.

AspiringEngineer42.title: Aspiring engineer
AspiringEngineer42.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. [PAWN_pronoun] took apart and put together almost anything [PAWN_pronoun] could find.
[PAWN_pronoun] got used to repairing toys brought to [PAWN_objective] by other children, and even fixed a few devices from [PAWN_possessive] elders.

ExpertHandyman95.title: Expert handyman
ExpertHandyman95.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a traveling engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for [PAWN_objective].

MedicalStudent18.title: Medical student
MedicalStudent18.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a glitterworld in a family of doctors and chose to maintain the tradition.
[PAWN_pronoun] had few friends, but got along with [PAWN_possessive] siblings very well.

MedicSoldier37.title: Medic soldier
MedicSoldier37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.
[PAWN_pronoun] left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

HighBaroness49.title: High baroness
HighBaroness49.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family.
She was placed In charge of running her home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

ExiledResearcher36.title: Exiled researcher
ExiledResearcher36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s love of robotics was not appreciated in her technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and she was never allowed to return.

WorldSlider50.title: World slider
WorldSlider50.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. [PAWN_pronoun] learned not to leave evidence of his presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from his fellow criminals.

Villain66.title: Villain
Villain66.desc: After rising to the top of his criminal band, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. He excelled at bending others to his will.

MedicalStudent71.title: Medical student
MedicalStudent71.desc: Born into a long line of doctors, [PAWN_nameDef] was tutored in all fields of medicine, from herbal ointments to the modern synthetic drugs. [PAWN_pronoun] also picked up a healthy disdain for lower class work.

SpaceNavyDoctor40.title: Space navy doctor
SpaceNavyDoctor40.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

AspergersRebel96.title: Aspergers rebel
AspergersRebel96.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.
[PAWN_possessive] Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

GovernmentAgent80.title: Government agent
GovernmentAgent80.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During [PAWN_possessive] training [PAWN_pronoun] was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.
Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don’t bother [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_pronoun] sees no reason to clean them up.

ShootingComa31.title: Shooting coma
ShootingComa31.desc: Nebulys fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When he awoke, he was useless at most tasks - but he could aim pretty well.

SelflessHunter57.title: Selfless hunter
SelflessHunter57.desc:
Nebulys was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong.
Along the way, he helped people in need.

PsychologyStudent88.title: Psychology student
PsychologyStudent88.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars.
His dreams prompted him to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

AcolyteOfStars66.title: Acolyte of stars
AcolyteOfStars66.desc:
Ever the dreamer, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled across the universe to find the thing he felt was calling to him.
[PAWN_pronoun] became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

SpaceSmuggler10.title: Space smuggler
SpaceSmuggler10.desc:
Tater's parents used him to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds.
Aided by his small size, Tater became very adept at carrying out his parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

SpaceRaider65.title: Space raider
SpaceRaider65.desc: Tater was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, he became the feared enemy of many settlements.

Abductee2.title: Abductee
Abductee2.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was abducted by xenohumans when [PAWN_pronoun] was still a baby. They experimented on [PAWN_objective] to understand his genetic structure.
As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_nameDef] grew a little bit too big and strong for his captors and eventually escaped.

Spy40.title: Spy
Spy40.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by [PAWN_possessive] government in infiltration and espionage. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to keep a cool head and to talk [PAWN_possessive] way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, [PAWN_pronoun] was capable of more violent direct action.

BlessedChild86.title: Blessed child
BlessedChild86.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout [PAWN_possessive] childhood.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

WanderingHealer6.title: Wandering healer
WanderingHealer6.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with [PAWN_possessive] practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld.
Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed [PAWN_objective] most.

YouthSoldier99.title: Youth soldier
YouthSoldier99.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born into a long line of soldiers. He followed that heritage, joining a military training program.
He excelled in all physical training programs in his Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While he was never particularly bright or nimble, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the value of hard work and suffering.

VeteranSoldier2.title: Veteran soldier
VeteranSoldier2.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] fought many tours against pirates, rebels, and xenos. He endured the glory and horrors of war.
Worn down by drills, wars, and battle scars, [PAWN_nameDef] 'retired' to the easy soldier life of colonial civility enforcement. He spent his days polishing his war medals, knowing he had done his bloodline proud.

GlitterworldKid84.title: Glitterworld kid
GlitterworldKid84.desc:
The son of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, Chaz was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than his parents. [PAWN_pronoun] kept mostly to himself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby.
In [PAWN_possessive] teens, [PAWN_pronoun] ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

CosmeticReject89.title: Cosmetic reject
CosmeticReject89.desc:
Living on the streets, Chaz submitted himself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.
After some painful cosmetic modification, Chaz barely resembles his former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until he was rescued, Chaz is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

FeralChild73.title: Feral child
FeralChild73.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] and his family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld.
One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. He then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found him.

RaiderKing70.title: Raider king
RaiderKing70.desc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, [PAWN_nameDef] rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew his name and his ruthlessness.

Scout86.title: Scout
Scout86.desc:
Nate loved being outdoors. His parents enrolled him in a program that taught military scouting skills. He thrived when he was left alone in the wilderness.
Due to this upbringing, however, [PAWN_nameDef] did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

FrontierMarshal75.title: Frontier marshal
FrontierMarshal75.desc:
Nate was the marshal of his colony. He tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed his family and left him for dead.
After regaining his health, Nate arrested the mayor. [PAWN_pronoun] left his homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

TraineeAlchemist98.title: Trainee alchemist
TraineeAlchemist98.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval world. He learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on his planet.

ReligiousHierarch42.title: Religious hierarch
ReligiousHierarch42.desc:
Ordained as a priest in his local community, [PAWN_nameDef] used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. He held numerous titles and lands.
One day, a merchant landed his spaceship near [PAWN_nameDef]'s home. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

Pickpocket96.title: Pickpocket
Pickpocket96.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed [PAWN_possessive] parents' murder at a young age. With no guidance, [PAWN_pronoun] had to fend for [PAWN_objective]self any way possible. Joining a small group of misfits [PAWN_pronoun] did whatever was necessary to survive.

CriminalSurgeon8.title: Criminal surgeon
CriminalSurgeon8.desc:
Being near many injured fellow criminals, [PAWN_nameDef] took it upon [PAWN_objective]self to work on them.
Although many people died, [PAWN_pronoun] did get better at using knives.

SpaceCadet12.title: Space cadet
SpaceCadet12.desc:
Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on his home planet, Jake threw down his hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown.
He served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

SanitationCaptain28.title: Sanitation captain
SanitationCaptain28.desc:
After graduating officer training school, Jake was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. He served there for a year before his "gallant" actions saw him reassigned to the maintenance corps.
It was with the maintenance corps he was dubbed Table on account of his legs.

Naturalist25.title: Naturalist
Naturalist25.desc:
Mitch grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. He had to hunt and grow food to survive.
[PAWN_possessive] family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made Mitch very suspicious and slow to trust anyone he doesn't know.

OverwatchSniper73.title: Overwatch sniper
OverwatchSniper73.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] didn't know why he joined the military, but he stayed to protect his fellow soldiers.
Army life broke him down and built him back up. It taught him marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

Drudge47.title: Drudge
Drudge47.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was never sure what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what [PAWN_possessive] future would be like.
[PAWN_pronoun] entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

GalacticSightseer55.title: Galactic sightseer
GalacticSightseer55.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] traveled the stars. [PAWN_pronoun] could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it. Seeing the wonders of the galaxy was where [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] calling.
[PAWN_pronoun] loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. The wonders of the universe inspired [PAWN_objective] like nothing else could.

ChildOfDrifters15.title: Child of drifters
ChildOfDrifters15.desc: Ever since [PAWN_pronoun] was very small, [PAWN_nameDef] had never known a home beyond [PAWN_possessive] parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. [PAWN_possessive] life was often perilous but never dull, and [PAWN_pronoun] inherited [PAWN_possessive] parents' wanderlust at a young age.

WanderingCrafter28.title: Wandering crafter
WanderingCrafter28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] continued to follow [PAWN_possessive] parents' nomadic ways, supporting himself with his crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and [PAWN_pronoun] often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put [PAWN_possessive] skills to good use.

TribalThunderer25.title: Tribal thunderer
TribalThunderer25.desc: Years ago, [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. [PAWN_nameDef] is such a child.

MutinousCaptain49.title: Mutinous captain
MutinousCaptain49.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was taken to the stars by slavers after [PAWN_possessive] tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years [PAWN_pronoun] learned the language of [PAWN_possessive] captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat.
The captain only learned of [PAWN_nameDef]'s true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

CorpBredStudent62.title: Corp-bred student
CorpBredStudent62.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. [PAWN_possessive] family had been working for that corporation for four generations.
At age five, [PAWN_pronoun] enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. [PAWN_nameDef] excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorpResearcher37.title: Corp researcher
CorpResearcher37.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

EarthColonist29.title: Earth colonist
EarthColonist29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on Earth. As a child, [PAWN_pronoun] was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

SoleSurvivor46.title: Sole survivor
SoleSurvivor46.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked his home and killed his people, he was the last survivor.

MilitaryTrainee74.title: Military trainee
MilitaryTrainee74.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

AWOLSoldier26.title: AWOL soldier
AWOLSoldier26.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an infantryman.
When [PAWN_pronoun] was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, [PAWN_pronoun] decided [PAWN_pronoun] did not want to be a soldier. He was able to escape via military spacejet.

Bookworm75.title: Bookworm
Bookworm75.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

Explorer36.title: Explorer
Explorer36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ColonyKid89.title: Colony kid
ColonyKid89.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_pronoun] was always interested in science and medicine.
[PAWN_nameDef] never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

StarshipDoctor78.title: Starship doctor
StarshipDoctor78.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor on a starship. He was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of his own. However, he was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

CaravanChild53.title: Caravan child
CaravanChild53.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a urbvilág merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, she disliked boy stuff, and got into her mother’s things all the time.
Eventually, she traveled with her mother to a glitterworld and spent her savings on a body she was happy with.

BountyHunter28.title: Bounty hunter
BountyHunter28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

ReEducatedYouth32.title: Re-educated youth
ReEducatedYouth32.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth.
[PAWN_pronoun] was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

FallenOfficial20.title: Fallen official
FallenOfficial20.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an official for an autocratic government.
When [PAWN_possessive] superiors demanded [PAWN_pronoun] participate in atrocities, [PAWN_nameDef] resigned and escaped from [PAWN_possessive] homeworld with nothing but the clothes on [PAWN_possessive] back.

FarmMechanic40.title: Farm mechanic
FarmMechanic40.desc: Growing up on a farming planet, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time learning about the automated machinery that grew and harvested the multitude of crops.

OrbitalReservist59.title: Orbital reservist
OrbitalReservist59.desc:
When the government declared that it would strengthen its military defenses, [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted and trained.
[PAWN_pronoun] was stationed on an orbital base, manning the defense systems and, in dire situations, descending in a dropship to the surface.

AccursedChild43.title: Accursed child
AccursedChild43.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared [PAWN_objective] a child of darkness brought [PAWN_objective] under their care.
[PAWN_possessive] entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of [PAWN_possessive] people - until the day of calling.

ShamanOfShadows30.title: Shaman of shadows
ShamanOfShadows30.desc:
When the monsters of fire came from the sky, [PAWN_nameDef] was called upon by [PAWN_possessive] tribe to guide them into battle.
[PAWN_nameDef] made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

AmateurAstronomer76.title: Amateur astronomer
AmateurAstronomer76.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with astronomy. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through his telescope.
[PAWN_pronoun] is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

StationSecurity1.title: Station security
StationSecurity1.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There he prevented illegal human trafficking.
Once, fire broke out on the station, and [PAWN_pronoun] saved many from the flames. Since then, [PAWN_pronoun] has avoided fires.

FarmHand94.title: Farm hand
FarmHand94.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a farm on a smaller colony world.
Everything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including [PAWN_nameDef]. This helped [PAWN_objective] build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

SpaceTrafficker87.title: Space trafficker
SpaceTrafficker87.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] discovered [PAWN_pronoun] was heir of [PAWN_possessive] distant uncle's weapons-trading business.
To protect the future of the company [PAWN_pronoun] went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances".

EnergeticPopIdol4.title: Energetic pop idol
EnergeticPopIdol4.desc:
Priscilla grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. She spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.
However, she decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying her enough attention, so she left.

PopIdolPirate25.title: Pop idol pirate
PopIdolPirate25.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] and her fans set out as a space pirate crew. She raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread her name.
[PAWN_nameDef] became afraid of fire when a rival burned her stage down. She relied on her fans to do the work she found unappealing.

IcePlanetChild56.title: Ice planet child
IcePlanetChild56.desc:
Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, [PAWN_nameDef] only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions.
The lack of social interaction made him develop a interest in engineering - but he never developed any great fondness for humans.

Roboticist87.title: Roboticist
Roboticist87.desc:
Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of [PAWN_nameDef]'s ocean planet. [PAWN_pronoun] created robots to replace them.
Over time, he collected a small crew of robots to do his bidding. [PAWN_pronoun] became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

ToxicChild59.title: Toxic child
ToxicChild59.desc:
Growing up on a an Industrial planet, [PAWN_nameDef] started working in a chemical plant at age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left him mentally scarred.
He eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

StalwartFarmer91.title: Stalwart farmer
StalwartFarmer91.desc:
With the farm under constant threat from brigands, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to defend himself with his father's rifle. [PAWN_pronoun] also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out.
He once tried to paint a picture of his home, but discovered that he could only draw scribbles and ducks.

BoyScout19.title: Boy scout
BoyScout19.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was in a boy scout troop on a midworld.
He learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

UrbworldPimp46.title: Urbworld pimp
UrbworldPimp46.desc:
At first, [PAWN_nameDef] made a small profit from selling drugs. Then, he switched to selling women and made a fortune.
[PAWN_pronoun] developed great skills with his fists. He also learned to fix up the injuries [PAWN_pronoun] inflicted on the girls.

ScienceProdigy96.title: Science prodigy
ScienceProdigy96.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was top of her class in chemistry, physics, exobiology, astronomy and opera.
An unfortunate lab accident left her with a deathly fear of fire.

ParticlePhysicist6.title: Particle physicist
ParticlePhysicist6.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed cutting-edge physics research. She wanted to help build a better and more peaceful future.

SpeederRacer68.title: Speeder racer
SpeederRacer68.desc:
Rusty was the son of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia.
He found his first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of his homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced him to learn to defend himself with a quick word or a quicker shot.

DefenseLawyer2.title: Defense lawyer
DefenseLawyer2.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] found that [PAWN_pronoun] could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where [PAWN_possessive] silver tongue could be useful, [PAWN_pronoun] turned to the law.
[PAWN_pronoun] often defended the illegal speeder racers [PAWN_pronoun] grew up with.

MercenaryRecruit61.title: Mercenary recruit
MercenaryRecruit61.desc: Born to a long line of off-world mercenaries, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a busy trading hub. At a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was recruited into one of the mercenary crews.

Ranger8.title: Ranger
Ranger8.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone, deep in a forest. [PAWN_pronoun] protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] own material needs without outside help.

MarineCadet8.title: Marine cadet
MarineCadet8.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was in a planetary marine cadet program.
[PAWN_pronoun] was kicked out for shooting an officer. It was never established whether this was an accident.

ClanChief70.title: Clan chief
ClanChief70.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

YoungPsychologist60.title: Young psychologist
YoungPsychologist60.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of [PAWN_possessive] mother's cab.
Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, [PAWN_pronoun] soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

FactionLeader69.title: Faction leader
FactionLeader69.desc:
Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes.
For fun, [PAWN_pronoun] gathered them and lead them to a certain death. [PAWN_pronoun] knew then that [PAWN_pronoun] had the talent to realize [PAWN_possessive] ambitions of leadership.

LabGrownChild20.title: Lab-grown child
LabGrownChild20.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human.
[PAWN_possessive] childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. He was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

CorpResearcher9.title: Corp researcher
CorpResearcher9.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research.
Unable to adapt to the social politics of his workplace, he buried himself in his work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, he yearned to be left alone.

Orphan70.title: Orphan
Orphan70.desc: Born in a brothel on a harsh world, [PAWN_nameDef] never really had a childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] did odd jobs to survive, and became distant from others.

SpaceMarine37.title: Space marine
SpaceMarine37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a member of an elite imperial space warrior unit. Subjected to intense training, [PAWN_pronoun] developed remarkable combat skills.
[PAWN_possessive] unit's quasi-religious ceremonies and beliefs helped [PAWN_objective] stay more-or-less sane through the horrors of the war.

TechScholar7.title: Tech scholar
TechScholar7.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a youth scholar of the world of science and technology.
[PAWN_pronoun] strived every day to expand his intellectual abilities.

TechnologyDoctor90.title: Technology doctor
TechnologyDoctor90.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] performed research into propulsive fuels and energy generation.
[PAWN_pronoun] loved technology research, and hoped to improve human life by doing it.

PitGladiator18.title: Pit gladiator
PitGladiator18.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was enslaved as a child and forced to fight creatures and other people in an underground fighting arena.
[PAWN_pronoun] showed an affinity for the sport, and eventually bought his own freedom. However, his time in the pits never brought him much intellectual stimulation.

PirateTrooper88.title: Pirate trooper
PirateTrooper88.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] joined a renowned interstellar criminal organization, and was often part of shock-assault boarding parties during starship raids.
Though his combat experience made him a good fighter, the ruthlessness of the job left [PAWN_objective] cold-hearted and unenthusiastic about social interaction.

FactoryWorker58.title: Factory worker
FactoryWorker58.desc:
Felix grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world.
Since poverty was rampant and food scarce, he worked for whatever wages he could get. This wasn't an easy life, but Felix never shied away from a hard day's work.

CombatMedic16.title: Combat medic
CombatMedic16.desc:
After his home country entered a large-scale war, Felix was drafted into the army as a combat medic.
His few years in the trenches trying to keep his fellow soldiers alive gave him an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made him stoic and reserved.

RichBoy51.title: Rich boy
RichBoy51.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends.
[PAWN_pronoun] was always told by his father that 'those peasants just want your money'. So, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of his time alone, or fighting other kids.

HiredGun99.title: Hired gun
HiredGun99.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] always wanted to prove [PAWN_pronoun] could make a living without [PAWN_possessive] parents' help. [PAWN_pronoun] did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people.
He eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. He discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

Athlete75.title: Athlete
Athlete75.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology.
Because of her demanding schedule and introverted nature, she became socially inept.

StilettoAssassin10.title: Stiletto assassin
StilettoAssassin10.desc:
Because of her skills, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a sense of superiority. In time, she lost her sense of empathy. She often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person.
After realizing her talents, she became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

SoleSurvivor99.title: Sole survivor
SoleSurvivor99.desc:
Hawke's entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease.
Found alone and adopted by another band, he never became close with the other tribe members. He preferred to stay away from his new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

Hunter7.title: Hunter
Hunter7.desc:
Hawke was a master hunter.
He learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

MechanoidHacker35.title: Mechanoid hacker
MechanoidHacker35.desc:
The only son of a well respected mechanoid inventor, [PAWN_nameDef] had access to the materials to subvert and modify [PAWN_possessive] father's creations.
[PAWN_pronoun] used drugs to increase [PAWN_possessive] productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited [PAWN_possessive] social life.

BattlefieldTech63.title: Battlefield tech
BattlefieldTech63.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] had received firearms training, but [PAWN_possessive] work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield.
[PAWN_pronoun] developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged him from service.

ProjectSubject48.title: Project subject
ProjectSubject48.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was picked by government agents for the mysterious "Frame Project".
Due to memory blockages, however, he remembers very little about this project or its true agenda - only that there were few survivors.

MasterTrader3.title: Master trader
MasterTrader3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master at trading. [PAWN_pronoun] earned his nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

HexCellArtist19.title: Hex-cell artist
HexCellArtist19.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food.
After [PAWN_possessive] popularity grew, [PAWN_pronoun] was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept [PAWN_objective] prisoner and forced [PAWN_objective] to create sculptures for sale.

ExoticChef84.title: Exotic chef
ExoticChef84.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] has always gone overboard when it comes to food. [PAWN_pronoun] is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.
[PAWN_possessive] quest for ingredients has brought [PAWN_objective] into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

PlagueProdigy12.title: Plague prodigy
PlagueProdigy12.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit his homeworld.
[PAWN_pronoun] watched his friends die, and his compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

MadScientist79.title: Mad scientist
MadScientist79.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s lust for knowledge was only matched by his disdain for anyone who would stand in the way of his research.
Traveling from world to world, he sought answers to questions few dared to ask.

PoorKid76.title: Poor kid
PoorKid76.desc: Abandoned by his parents, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to survive by himself before he was ten years old.

Warrior43.title: Warrior
Warrior43.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a war hero during [PAWN_possessive] planet's third world war. [PAWN_pronoun] helped prevent the launch of nuclear weapons during a particularly tense standoff.

Dreamer11.title: Dreamer
Dreamer11.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female.
[PAWN_pronoun] hated fighting, but when made angry, [PAWN_pronoun] could be dangerous. [PAWN_possessive] temper was quick.

SpaceExplorer81.title: Space explorer
SpaceExplorer81.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] once spent ten years trapped, alone on an alien planet. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly adapted to the local environment, and learned to communicate with [PAWN_possessive] local enemies.
This long period alone left him without close friends. [PAWN_possessive] heart is sensitive, but he learned to hide [PAWN_possessive] emotions very well.

UrbworldUrchin13.title: Urbworld urchin
UrbworldUrchin13.desc:
Meredith was born in the darkest slums of her urban homeworld. Neglected by her mother, she learned to survive on her own, battling for every scrap of food she saw.
Eventually, as her talents exceeded her peers, she ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left her mother behind.

Smuggler62.title: Smuggler
Smuggler62.desc:
As a contract pilot, Meredith had a knack for stealing goods and trafficking contraband without getting caught.
She eventually saved up enough to buy her own ship, and used it to travel from world to world dealing her goods in person.

MilitaryRecruit62.title: Military recruit
MilitaryRecruit62.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship.
From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to be a good soldier. They taught him how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

DestroyerGeneral40.title: Destroyer-general
DestroyerGeneral40.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.
[PAWN_pronoun] was known for his mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

StreetUrchin51.title: Street urchin
StreetUrchin51.desc:
Born to a poor family on an urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned on the streets at a young age.
He learned to steal and kill to survive the ruthless streets, gaining skills in melee and ranged combat. There was little time for talk in his life.

SerialMurderer52.title: Serial murderer
SerialMurderer52.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] started to enjoy killing people, so he did more often and perfected his methods. He lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours.
He enjoyed making artworks of his victims, and was known for leaving his signature on the bodies of those he killed.

KidScientist80.title: Kid scientist
KidScientist80.desc: Born into an influential family, [PAWN_nameDef] received the best education money could buy. Her intellect soon proved to be superior to many. However, her lack of empathy quickly put her at odds with her teachers and her parents.

MadScientist65.title: Mad scientist
MadScientist65.desc:
After finishing her education, [PAWN_nameDef] was hired by the planet's leading genetic researcher. Later, she was caught running illegal, inhumane experiments.
Despite her family's influence, she was convicted and sentenced to hard labor on a penal colony.

MedievalThief74.title: Medieval thief
MedievalThief74.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for himself.
At first, he only took what he needed. Then he learned to take what he wanted.

HumanTrafficker69.title: Human trafficker
HumanTrafficker69.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers.
Over time, he lost what little moral sense he had left.

TraumatizedYouth62.title: Traumatized youth
TraumatizedYouth62.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] lived on a pleasant midworld.
[PAWN_possessive] prosthophobe mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

MentalPatient64.title: Mental patient
MentalPatient64.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was placed in a psychiatric hospital. There, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time engaged in the calming activities of the asylum.
[PAWN_pronoun] was eventually released, but [PAWN_pronoun] retained [PAWN_possessive] emotional distance, [PAWN_possessive] curiosity about human anatomy, and [PAWN_possessive] namesake manic giggling.

YouthSoldier75.title: Youth soldier
YouthSoldier75.desc:
Born to a long line of soldiers, [PAWN_nameDef] joined a military training program.
[PAWN_pronoun] excelled in physical training, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While [PAWN_pronoun] was never particularly bright or nimble, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the value of hard work and suffering.

SpaceMarine48.title: Space marine
SpaceMarine48.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior in an Imperial navy.
[PAWN_possessive] job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And [PAWN_pronoun] was good at it.

GalacticPage15.title: Galactic page
GalacticPage15.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] served the high admiral of a space fleet. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.
In his feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

EnvoyOfTheStars91.title: Envoy of the stars
EnvoyOfTheStars91.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values he took with him on every mission.
[PAWN_possessive] prestigious position distanced him from backbreaking manual labor, allowing [PAWN_objective] to focus on his wordsmithing abilities. He left the blacksmithing to others.

ApprenticeSmith9.title: Apprentice smith
ApprenticeSmith9.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up helping in his father's smithy.
They were some of the last smiths on the planet that to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves.
Sometimes, after work, [PAWN_nameDef] would practice using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged.

Blacksmith32.title: Blacksmith
Blacksmith32.desc: As a blacksmith on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] gained a reputation for the high quality of [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't bad at using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged either.

CloneFarmed43.title: Clone-farmed
CloneFarmed43.desc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called 'Disposable'.

CloneFarmer72.title: Clone farmer
CloneFarmer72.desc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves -particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

GangMember12.title: Gang member
GangMember12.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up without parents. [PAWN_possessive] whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets.
No matter how hard it became to survive, he never gave up.

GangBoss0.title: Gang boss
GangBoss0.desc:
To survive, [PAWN_nameDef]'s gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes he had to kill the guards. Sometimes he had to kill the police who arrived to stop him.
After years of this, he became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

MilitantChild30.title: Militant child
MilitantChild30.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s military family forced him to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics.
In his own time, he built small inventions. This sharpened his mind.

LostMarine68.title: Lost marine
LostMarine68.desc:
Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in his planet's military, [PAWN_nameDef] disappeared without a trace.
Later, he reappeared at the head of his own military force. No one knows why he became who he was.

Killer70.title: Killer
Killer70.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought her the product of a snake demon and human coupling.
After watching how her human father betrayed and murdered her mother, she longed to see how many more humans she could get to fall into her hands.

Healer46.title: Healer
Healer46.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] took the time to admire the beauty of the world.
Her passive aggressiveness surfaced once in a while, but she tried to adapt to her changing life.

ProfessionalGamer86.title: Professional gamer
ProfessionalGamer86.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with video games since his hands were big enough to grip a joystick.
[PAWN_pronoun] achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when he retired early in his teenage years.

ToasterRepairman81.title: Toaster repairman
ToasterRepairman81.desc:
Good with his hands and passionate about technology, [PAWN_nameDef] aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change his home world forever.
A few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, he gave up on his dream and took a job more befitting his skill set.

DataDecoder25.title: Data decoder
DataDecoder25.desc:
Born on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was very interested in the process of documenting information, and quickly became senior glitterpedia recorder.
[PAWN_pronoun] was effective at self-study, but [PAWN_pronoun] was lacked in social experiences.

ArchotechSpy14.title: Archotech spy
ArchotechSpy14.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a cybernetic researcher. Studying a transcended world, [PAWN_pronoun] became too involved with [PAWN_possessive] subjects. Over time, the archotech machine core recruited [PAWN_objective] into its service, and used [PAWN_objective] as a spy.
When [PAWN_pronoun] later rebelled against [PAWN_possessive] non-human master, it sent mechanoids across space to hunt [PAWN_objective] down.

WolfPackMember79.title: Wolf pack member
WolfPackMember79.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was discarded by [PAWN_possessive] family. Raised by wolves, [PAWN_pronoun] ran, hunted, and defended [PAWN_possessive] pack.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

BehaviourResearch99.title: Behaviour research
BehaviourResearch99.desc:
Captured as a feral child, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into the ways of modern society. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility.
[PAWN_pronoun] specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. [PAWN_pronoun] never had interest in plants, however.

RebelStudent39.title: Rebel student
RebelStudent39.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged him to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age.
As a bored student, [PAWN_pronoun] found joy in challenging his teachers about the contradictions between his planet's official values and their government's policies.

PoliticalActivist61.title: Political activist
PoliticalActivist61.desc:
Matt was involved with a radical political faction which worked against his homeworld's government.
The guerilla tactics training that Matt received from his associates gave him the skills to fight, but also drove him to compromise his own beliefs.

Cadet99.title: Cadet
Cadet99.desc:
Born on the planet New China, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over his son.
[PAWN_nameDef] had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep his room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. [PAWN_pronoun] came to abhor violence.

Flaneur73.title: Flaneur
Flaneur73.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] strolled and sipped his way through the streets and cafes of [PAWN_possessive] world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached.
Through all this time, [PAWN_pronoun] remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

ShipTechnician62.title: Ship technician
ShipTechnician62.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of her home system. In this job, she learned to fix and improve many machines.
Sometimes, her ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

ChiefEngineer74.title: Chief engineer
ChiefEngineer74.desc:
As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.
She relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. She and her ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

BlacksmithsSon72.title: Blacksmith's son
BlacksmithsSon72.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. [PAWN_nameDef] would help his father whenever he could.
Later, [PAWN_possessive] father took him as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised him as a man. [PAWN_nameDef] also to on shooting as a hobby.

BlacksmithShooter88.title: Blacksmith shooter
BlacksmithShooter88.desc:
As a young blacksmith, [PAWN_nameDef]'s family shop was raided by the police. [PAWN_pronoun] shot two officers before they knocked him out and arrested him.
Sentenced to life in prison, [PAWN_nameDef] learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

JoywireAddict67.title: Joywire addict
JoywireAddict67.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s wealthy parents provided everything [PAWN_pronoun] ever wanted. After discovering joywires, [PAWN_pronoun] became obsessed. Once [PAWN_possessive] parents realized what happened, they cut [PAWN_objective] off.
Uncaring and often violent, [PAWN_pronoun] sought [PAWN_possessive] next joywire fix by any means possible.

AddictionCounsel61.title: Addiction counsel
AddictionCounsel61.desc:
After recovering from a joywire addiction, [PAWN_nameDef] adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others.
Travelling between communities, [PAWN_pronoun] used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

ChildKnave65.title: Child-knave
ChildKnave65.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a child-knave of King Loteric. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. [PAWN_pronoun] adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.
[PAWN_pronoun] served his lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

BloodgameSurvivor96.title: Bloodgame survivor
BloodgameSurvivor96.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.
[PAWN_possessive] manipulative nature made [PAWN_objective] quite a nightmare, even to the audience. He was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

WastelandWanderer2.title: Wasteland wanderer
WastelandWanderer2.desc:
Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed his ancestral home.
The boy managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath his family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

VoidspaceRaider8.title: Voidspace raider
VoidspaceRaider8.desc:
After years of seeking the assassin that broke up his family, [PAWN_nameDef] was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. He accepted, hoping to find the killer he sought.
Due to [PAWN_possessive] seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, he earned the nickname 'Blackjack' in recognition of his luck.

SocialPariah37.title: Social pariah
SocialPariah37.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family never fit in. They were oddballs who couldn't conform to their regimented society. Because of this, they were forced into cryptosleep and sent to different rimworlds, never to see each other again.

Vagabond48.title: Vagabond
Vagabond48.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] awoke on a dangerous planet with no resources and few survival skills. [PAWN_pronoun] bounced between camps, doing whatever work needed to be done, just to see the sun rise once more.

PyroAssistant17.title: Pyro assistant
PyroAssistant17.desc:
On an industrial world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned early that if [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to eat, [PAWN_pronoun] had to work. So work [PAWN_pronoun] did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where [PAWN_pronoun] was from, the safety laws were quite flexible.
[PAWN_pronoun] was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

MachineFixer97.title: Machine fixer
MachineFixer97.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen.
After a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to patch [PAWN_objective]self up pretty well. Despite the pain, [PAWN_pronoun] never learned to dislike fire.

StreetUrchin39.title: Street urchin
StreetUrchin39.desc:
After running away from home, [PAWN_nameDef] had to live on the streets.
She grew up fast, and learned early that she had to figure out how to fool people into connecting with her.

SpaceMerchant61.title: Space merchant
SpaceMerchant61.desc: As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, [PAWN_nameDef] sought to dominate her romantic interests as much as her business adversaries. When she didn't have her own ship to fly, she worked charter ships for hire.

RitualChild16.title: Ritual child
RitualChild16.desc:
Born with a special mark on [PAWN_possessive] neck, [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe chose to sacrifice [PAWN_objective] in a blood ritual. They left [PAWN_objective] in the forest to die. A pack of arctic wolves found and adopted [PAWN_objective].
Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make tools to hunt with the pack.

BeastSlayer8.title: Beast slayer
BeastSlayer8.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. [PAWN_pronoun] would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about [PAWN_possessive] prey before striking. [PAWN_pronoun] most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.
Preferring to work alone, [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BrothelGofer60.title: Brothel gofer
BrothelGofer60.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, [PAWN_nameDef] went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But [PAWN_pronoun] was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

DrugLieutenant88.title: Drug lieutenant
DrugLieutenant88.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.
His social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

LaborCampOrphan93.title: Labor camp orphan
LaborCampOrphan93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost her parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least she was clothed and fed.

UrbworldEnforcer55.title: Urbworld enforcer
UrbworldEnforcer55.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbvilág.
She dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbvilág nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

GameFanatic49.title: Game fanatic
GameFanatic49.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.
Once, while attempting to prove [PAWN_possessive] skills in the real world, [PAWN_pronoun] was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped, but the experience stayed with him.

ToolMechanic40.title: Tool mechanic
ToolMechanic40.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world.
After his firm closed due to scandal, [PAWN_pronoun] joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing [PAWN_possessive] wares between settlements.

ClassClown20.title: Class clown
ClassClown20.desc:
In the ultra-competitive environs of his glitterworld school, [PAWN_nameDef] always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.
[PAWN_pronoun] developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CraftShaper11.title: Craft shaper
CraftShaper11.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] locked [PAWN_objective]self in his studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.
Eventually, [PAWN_possessive] creations brought [PAWN_objective] the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrimeBossChild12.title: Crime boss' child
CrimeBossChild12.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.
When the family was attacked, [PAWN_possessive] father ordered [PAWN_objective] to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

MercenaryLeader48.title: Mercenary leader
MercenaryLeader48.desc:
Alone, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to rebuild [PAWN_possessive] father's life's work. [PAWN_pronoun] challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo.
[PAWN_possessive] men mutinied. [PAWN_pronoun] was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

SentimentalChild27.title: Sentimental child
SentimentalChild27.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, [PAWN_pronoun] tried to fix it. But, being a child, [PAWN_pronoun] did not always succeed. This hurt his sensitive soul.
[PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

SpecialForces72.title: Special forces
SpecialForces72.desc:
Give me a reason to kill - a good reason!
Markus was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that [PAWN_pronoun] entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] never imagined himself a lone hero, but [PAWN_pronoun] played [PAWN_possessive] part in the group well.

DustyFarmHand63.title: Dusty farm hand
DustyFarmHand63.desc:
From the time [PAWN_nameDef] could walk, [PAWN_pronoun] helped take care of the animals and crops that [PAWN_possessive] people tended in their arid homeland.
The work toughened [PAWN_objective], but left little time for intellectual activities.

DromedaryKnight31.title: Dromedary knight
DromedaryKnight31.desc:
Having caught the eye of [PAWN_possessive] people's Sand King, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the Sandy Boomrat fighting technique.
Always with a camel to carry his things, [PAWN_pronoun] served [PAWN_possessive] sand people faithfully.

HackerKid65.title: Hacker kid
HackerKid65.desc:
Born on a high-tech world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned hack computers at a young age.
Spending many hours tinkering alone made [PAWN_objective] very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

BattleMechanic79.title: Battle mechanic
BattleMechanic79.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.
[PAWN_pronoun] was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized [PAWN_possessive] own equipment with original modifications.

VideoGamer94.title: Video gamer
VideoGamer94.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in [PAWN_possessive] room, playing video games. [PAWN_pronoun] was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.
As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] turned to drugs to enhance his reality. During these trying times [PAWN_pronoun] found passion and refuge in the gym.

DischargedSoldier81.title: Discharged soldier
DischargedSoldier81.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the military and learned to fight.
Too smart for the army, [PAWN_pronoun] questioned and often disagreed with [PAWN_possessive] superiors' decisions. This eventually led to [PAWN_possessive] dishonorable discharge and left [PAWN_objective] with a chip on [PAWN_possessive] shoulder.

Student1.title: Student
Student1.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment.
[PAWN_pronoun] was very good at convincing others to do his physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

Chemist38.title: Chemist
Chemist38.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a research chemist. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

SuperSoldier19.title: Super soldier
SuperSoldier19.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight.
Most infants died, but [PAWN_nameDef] did not. He killed his first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

SuperSoldier81.title: Super soldier
SuperSoldier81.desc:
Product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government, [PAWN_nameDef] was lost. [PAWN_pronoun] survived the final suicide attack on the enemy mothership. What now?
For the first time in his life, [PAWN_pronoun] had no orders, no objectives. [PAWN_pronoun] rose from wreckage and strove towards uncertainty, towards freedom.

HeadjackAddict49.title: Headjack addict
HeadjackAddict49.desc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

CorporateBuilder80.title: Corporate builder
CorporateBuilder80.desc:
Even as [PAWN_pronoun] stewed in [PAWN_possessive] own wasted potential, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.
Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased [PAWN_possessive] remaining creative impulses.

UrbworldArmyBrat71.title: Urbworld army brat
UrbworldArmyBrat71.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on an urbvilág military base. [PAWN_pronoun] was too young to fight, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make [PAWN_objective]self useful in other ways.
[PAWN_pronoun] became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.
